Comments: Used in addition to Diflucan.  Helped a lot with the itching.  I felt sluggish & flu-like for a couple of days (not sure if it was from the meds or not).  I had a yeast infection for two months & this was my last resort.  I tried many OTC items & even yogurt.  I dont like to take medications if I dont have too_ but the itching just got too intense...
